siteConfig.title: 2024 RAM ProMaster EV | Commercial Electric Van
siteConfig.description: Discover the 2024 RAM ProMaster EV commercial electric van. Zero emissions, 162-mile range, 3,020 lb payload, 520 cubic feet cargo space. Features 110 kWh battery, 268 HP, 302 lb-ft torque. Starting at $77,995. Eligible for tax credits.

hero.title: The All-New RAM ProMaster EV
hero.description: Transform your business with customizable models, zero-emission solutions and access to potential tax credits. The future of work is within reach.

110 kWh Battery Power for Extended Range

chargingOptions.title: Charger Options
chargingOptions.description: Charging the RAM ProMaster EV commercial electric van is easy with the available Level 2 charger. It can charge the 110 kWh battery overnight so it's ready for work the next day. And recharge the van while on a lunch break with the Level 3 DC fast charger, which can charge the van in under an hour. A Level 1 charger also comes standard with the RAM ProMaster EV.

chargingOptions.title: Smart Charging Port
chargingOptions.description: Whether you're indoors or outdoors, charge up the RAM ProMaster EV via an available and easy-to-use quick-release mount with a lockable, weatherproof enclosure. The smart charging port is designed for both commercial and residential charging locations.

technology.title: Infotainment System
technology.description: Enhance every drive with the Uconnect 5 infotainment system in the RAM ProMaster EV, featuring a 10-inch touchscreen that delivers lightning-fast responsiveness and customizable settings—keeping drivers connected, informed, and in control of their commercial electric van.

technology.title: Driver Information Digital Cluster
technology.description: Stay informed on the road with the high-tech Driver Information Digital Cluster in the RAM ProMaster EV, featuring a vibrant 7-inch color display that delivers essential driving details—ensuring a smarter, more efficient driving experience for commercial van operators.

technology.title: Charging Identification Lights
technology.description: Easily monitor your RAM ProMaster EV's charging status with five dashboard indicator lights, designed to provide real-time updates. This smart solution keeps commercial van operators informed and ready to stay productive, even on the busiest worksites.

technology.title: Power Status
technology.description: Stay in control with real-time charging updates right from the cabin of the RAM ProMaster EV. In addition to the digital dashboard gauge, the Uconnect 5 touchscreen displays charge status, level, and time to completion—along with essential insights like range, nearby charging locations, and more for your commercial electric van.

businessPoints.title: Tax Benefits
businessPoints.description: Driving the 2024 RAM ProMaster EV commercial electric van can come with tax benefits like the Section 168(k) Tax Deduction that can help boost your bottom line. Discover how making the switch to electric can be cost-effective for you and your business. Create an account on CommercialEVs.com to see grants and incentives available in your area for commercial electric vehicles!

businessPoints.alt: 2024 RAM ProMaster EV side view parked - Commercial electric van profile with walk-in pocket door
businessPoints.title: Big Business Benefits
businessPoints.description: The RAM ProMaster EV includes great business-focused features and benefits like expedited service, shuttles and loaner vehicles, included with the BusinessLink Program. RAM ProMaster EV owners can help streamline their businesses as preferred commercial customers with dedicated support for fleet operations.
